data_table.description: Derived Variables, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ASPIRINCODE01
variable.description: Used aspirin-containing analgesics (at visit 1) in last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes), based on 2004 Med code [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: STATINCODE01
variable.description: Statin use in the past 2 weeks based on 2004 medication codes [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: ANTICOAGCODE01
variable.description: Used anticoagulates (at visit 1) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: PREVHF01
variable.description: Prevelent heart failure at baseline [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LVHSCR01
variable.description: Absolute value of ECGRA198 plus ECGRA170 Cornell voltage in Uv (S In V3+r In Avl) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: NLVHSC01
variable.description: Cornell voltage in nm [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: CLVH01
variable.description: LVH present by Cornell definition [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Male/Female less than or equal to 28

variable.name: QWAVE04A
variable.description: Diagnostic Q-wave present from adjudicated ECG data [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: QWAVE07A
variable.description: Major Q-wave present with no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4, from adjudicated ECG records [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: QWAVE08B
variable.description: Minor Q-wave present with ST or T codes and no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4 codes from adjudicated ECG records [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: ECGMI04
variable.description: Prevalent myocardial infarction from adjudicated electrocardiograms [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: PREVMI05
variable.description: Prevalent MI from ECG or medical history [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No of miocardial infraction [MI] from ECG or medical history
Yes, miocardial infraction [MI] from ECG or medical history

variable.name: PRVCHD05
variable.description: Prevalent coronary heart disease [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: CURDRK02
variable.description: Current drinker [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: QWVEM08B
variable.description: Minor Q-wave present with ST or T codes and no 7-1-1. 7-1-2, or 7-4 codes, from original machine coded ECG records [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MACHMI02
variable.description: Prevalent myocardial infarction from original machine coded ECGs [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: RACEGRP
variable.description: Race (from FTRA23) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Sex (uncorrected from FTRA22) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: V1AGE01
variable.description: Age at visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: The difference in years between IDNA11 (Birth date) and V1DATE01 (Derived visit 1 date).

variable.name: CIGT01
variable.description: Cigarette smoking status [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Unknown, but one of the above three categories may be ruled out

variable.name: CIGTYR01
variable.description: Cigarette years of smoking [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: PIPE01
variable.description: Pipe smoking status [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Unknown, but one of the above three categories may be ruled out

variable.name: PIPEYR01
variable.description: Ounce years of smoking [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Average number of ounces per day times the number of years smoked.

variable.name: CIGR01
variable.description: Cigar/cigarillo smoking status [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Unknown, but one of the above three categories may be ruled out

variable.name: CIGRYR01
variable.description: Cigar/cigarillo years of smoking [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: BMI01
variable.description: Body Mass Index in Kg/(m2) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: SIT_HT01
variable.description: Sitting height In cm [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MNTRCP01
variable.description: Mean Triceps In mm [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MNSSCP01
variable.description: Mean subscapular in mm [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: WSTHPR01
variable.description: Waist-to-hip ratio [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Girth of Waist in cm/Girth of Hip in cm

variable.name: RANGNA01
variable.description: Rose angina [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: DRNKR01
variable.description: Drinker status [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: ETHANL03
variable.description: Usual ethanol intake in [g/wk] [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HYPERT04
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 4; replaces HYPERT01 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HYPERT05
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 5; replaces HYPER02 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HYPERT06
variable.description: Hypertension, definition 6; replaces HYPERT03 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: GLUCOS01
variable.description: Derived glucose value in mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: TGLEFH01
variable.description: Triglycerides <= 400 mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: FAST0802
variable.description: Fasting time of 8 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: FAST1202
variable.description: Fasting time of 12 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: GLUSIU01
variable.description: Recalibrated glucose in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: TCHSIU01
variable.description: Total cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: APASIU01
variable.description: Apolipoprotein AI in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: APBSIU01
variable.description: Apolipoprotein B in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: TRGSIU01
variable.description: Total triglycerides In SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: INSSIU01
variable.description: Insulin in SI Units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: RPOSMI01
variable.description: Rose possible myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No of possible miocardia infraction [MI] by Rose questionnaire
Possible MI by Rose questionnaire = Yes.

variable.name: WORK_I02
variable.description: Physical activity at work, definition 2 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Score of the work index after occupations were coded. One of the three physical activity indices - work index, sport index and leisure time index.

variable.name: WORK_I03
variable.description: Physical activity at work, definition 3 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Score of the interim work index after occupations were coded. One of the three physical activity indices -- work index, sport index and leisure time index

variable.name: SPRT_I02
variable.description: Sport during leisure time [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Score of sport index during leisure time. It is one of the three physical activity indices - work index, sport index and leisure time index.

variable.name: LISR_I01
variable.description: Physical activity during leisure time excluding sport [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Score of leisure time index. One of three physical activity indices - work index, sport index and leisure time index.

variable.name: ELEVEL01
variable.description: Education levels, D\definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Education Level = Grade school or 0 years education
Education Level = High school, but no degree
Education Level = Graduate school or Professional school

variable.name: ELEVEL02
variable.description: Education level, definition 2 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Education Level = Basic Education or 0 Years Education

variable.name: ROSEIC03
variable.description: Rose intermittent claudication [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MDDXMI02
variable.description: MD diagnosed myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HXOFMI02
variable.description: History of myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No of self or physician-reported heart attack
Yes, self or physician-reported heart attack

variable.name: QWAVEM07
variable.description: Major Q-wave present with no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4, from original machine coded ECG records [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: SYMCHD03
variable.description: Symptomatic coronary heart disease [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No of symptomatic coronary heart disease

variable.name: DIABTS02
variable.description: Diabetes - lower cut point 140 [mg/dL] [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: DIABTS03
variable.description: Diabetes - lower cut point 126 [mg/dL] [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HYPTMD01
variable.description: Blood pressure lowering medications in the past 2 weeks [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: ECGSEN01
variable.description: ECG visual coding flag [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Indicates presence of ECG visual coding data

variable.name: CURSMK01
variable.description: Current cigarette smoker [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: FORSMK01
variable.description: Former cigarette smoker [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: EVRSMK01
variable.description: Ever smoked cigarettes [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: FORDRK01
variable.description: Former drinker [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: EVRDRK01
variable.description: Ever drinker [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HDL01
variable.description: HDL cholesterol (recalibrated lipid) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HDL301
variable.description: HDL3 cholesterol (recalibrated lipid) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HDL201
variable.description: HDL2 cholesterol (recalibrated lipid) [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LDL02
variable.description: Recalibrated LDL cholesterol [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HDLSIU02
variable.description: Recalibrated HDL cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HD3SIU02
variable.description: Re-calibrated HDL(3) cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HD2SIU02
variable.description: Re-calibrated HDL(2) cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LDLSIU02
variable.description: Recalibrated LDL cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: TOTCAL03
variable.description: Total calorie intake in Kcal/day from dietary and ethanol consumption, but excluding other calories from alcoholic beverages [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: OCCUPN01
variable.description: Most recent occupation [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Technical, sales, and administrative support occupations
Precision production, craft, and repair occupations
Missing job code for non-homemakers or homemakers with job code

variable.name: MENOPS01
variable.description: Menopausal status [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: HORMON02
variable.description: Use of hormones [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Former hormone user or former user of other medications reported by participants as hormones

variable.name: BIFSHD01
variable.description: Shadowing in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: INTSHD01
variable.description: Shadowing in either internal carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: COMSHD01
variable.description: Shadowing in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: BIFPLQ01
variable.description: Plaque in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: INTPLQ01
variable.description: Plaque In either internal carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: COMPLQ01
variable.description: Plaque in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LCOMPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the left common carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: RCOMPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the right common carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LBIFPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the left carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: RBIFPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the right carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: RINTPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the right internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: LINTPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in the left internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: COMPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either common [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: BIFPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: INTPS01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: LPLQSD01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in any left carotid site [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sides)

variable.name: RPLQSD01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in any right carotid site [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLQSHD01
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing (both, 1 w/o other, neither) in any carotid site [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLAQUE01
variable.description: Plaque (with or without shadowing) in any carotid site [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: PLAQUE03
variable.description: Plaque in any carotid site - alternative definition [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Else if not equal to 0 or not equal to 1
Else if not equal to 0 or not equal to 1

variable.name: ABI04
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index , visit 1, definition 4 [Ankle Brachial Index Data, exam 1]

variable.name: ABIV1
variable.description: ABI was measured at visit 1 [Ankle Brachial Index Data, exam 1]
variable.value: Not measured, missing one or both BP values
Not valid, one or both BP values out of range

variable.name: PAD02
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease visit 1, definition 2 - same for both genders [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: PAD01
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease visit 1, definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Otherwise: PAD01 not equal to 1, PAD01 not equal to 2

variable.name: LEGANK01
variable.description: Leg used for ankle blood pressure at visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: UBMDA01 equal to missing, and if the 5th digit in the participant's ID is odd
UBMDA01 equal to 1 (left leg, based on the popliteal artery scan, noted on the UBMD file)
UBMDA01 equal to missing and if the 5th digit in the participant's ID is even
UBMDA01 equal to 17 (right leg, based on the popliteal artery scan, noted on the UBMD file)

variable.name: HYPTMDCODE01
variable.description: Hypertension lowering medication within past 2 weeks [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.value: Participant has not taken hypertension lowering medication in past two weeks
Participant has taken hypertension lowering medication in past two weeks
Unknown whether participant has taken hypertension lowering medication in past two weeks

variable.name: CHDRISK10YR_01
variable.description: 10 year of coronary heart disease [CHD] risk score at visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: STROKERISK10YR_01
variable.description: 10 year stroke risk score at visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: Predicted 10 year risk of incident Ischemic Stroke. A percentage variable thus can take values from 0 to 100 or missing.

variable.name: DIABETESRISK9YR_01
variable.description: 9 year diabetes risk score at visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: DIABETESRISK9YR_01 is predicted 9 year risk of incident type 2 diabetes. As a percentage variable, it can take values from 0 to 100 . If a participant had prevalent diabetes or a missing constituent variable, the predicted risk was not calculated.

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE01
variable.description: Cholesterol lowering medication in past 2 wks: using 2004 Med. code, visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE02
variable.description: Medications which secondarily affect cholesterol: using 2004 Med. Code, visit 1 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MOMPRECHD
variable.description: Maternal premature history of coronary heart disease [CHD] [Cohort, Exam 1]
variable.comment: MOMPRECHD will take a value of 'Y' for "Yes, participant's mother had premature CHD" if the participant's mother had a history of CHD (MOMHISTORYCHD= 'Y') and if she was told her first CHD incident occurred before she was 60 years of age.

variable.name: DADPRECHD
variable.description: Premature paternal history of coronary heart disease [CHD], age<55 [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MOMHISTORYSTR
variable.description: New maternal history of stroke [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: DADHISTORYSTR
variable.description: New paternal history of stroke [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MOMHISTORYCHD
variable.description: New maternal history of coronary heart disease [CHD] [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: DADHISTORYCHD
variable.description: New paternal history of coronary heart disease [CHD] [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: MOMHISTORYDIA
variable.description: New maternal history of diabetes [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: DADHISTORYDIA
variable.description: New paternal history of diabetes [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: CENTERID
variable.description: Recoded Center ID [Cohort, Exam 1]

variable.name: ENROLL_YR
variable.description: Year of enrollment [Cohort, Exam 1]
